summary: Used to push membership bulk status updates to Lazada
description: Used to push membership bulk status updates to Lazada. Please note that this is not an incremental update, thus information left out that haven been in our system before, will be removed on our end.

query.name: tier
query.description: Customer’s tier in partner side, shown as-is

query.name: tier_expiry
query.description: Expiry of the membership, shown as-is

query.name: p_uid
query.description: A unique identifier of the member on partner side, used to establish the link to partner ID.

query.name: member_name
query.description: Name of member on partner side, to easier identify the membership on My Account pages

query.name: valid_from
query.description: Valid from of this balance in RFC RFC3339 format. Ignore if this is no validity period for the balance

query.name: status
query.description: One of: ‘active’ – For activated members ‘inactive’ – For inactive member ‘pending’ – For members that are pending activation

query.name: valid_to
query.description: Valid to of this balance in RFC RFC3339 format. Ignore if this is no validity period for the balance

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/partner/update')
request.add_api_parameter("tier", "Gold")
request.add_api_parameter("balance", "6000")
request.add_api_parameter("tier_expiry", "2019-10-02T15:00:00Z")
request.add_api_parameter("p_uid", "123456")
request.add_api_parameter("member_name", "Marie Curie")
request.add_api_parameter("valid_from", "2019-10-02T15:00:00Z")
request.add_api_parameter("status", "BLACKLISTED")
request.add_api_parameter("valid_to", "2019-10-02T15:00:00Z")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/partner/update')
request.add_api_param('tier', 'Gold')
request.add_api_param('balance', '6000')
request.add_api_param('tier_expiry', '2019-10-02T15:00:00Z')
request.add_api_param('p_uid', '123456')
request.add_api_param('member_name', 'Marie Curie')
request.add_api_param('valid_from', '2019-10-02T15:00:00Z')
request.add_api_param('status', 'BLACKLISTED')
request.add_api_param('valid_to', '2019-10-02T15:00:00Z')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
